name: BarriersToHealthcareServices
title: Barriers to Healthcare & Services
description: Identification of barriers the person experiences that make it difficult to access or receive care. e.g. distance to care, unavailability of appointments at doctor's office, long wait times at doctors office, lack of transportation etc. (Business ID: Entry 743862)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Barriers to Healthcare & Services.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an identification of barriers the person experiences that make it difficult to access or receive care. e.g. distance to care, unavailability of appointments at doctor's office, long wait times at doctors office, lack of transportation etc..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Barriers to Healthcare & Services.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Barriers to Healthcare & Services.)

contains.display: Unavailability and inaccessibility of health-care facilities
